first_para: David Stuart Havard (born 7 February 1950) is a British Labour Party politician, who was Member of Parliament (MP) for Merthyr Tydfil and Rhymney from 2001 to 2015. Before then, he had been a secretary of the MSF union.

full.extract:
David Stuart Havard (born 7 February 1950) is a British Labour Party politician, who was Member of Parliament (MP) for Merthyr Tydfil and Rhymney from 2001 to 2015. Before then, he had been a secretary of the MSF union.
In September 2014 Dai announced his decision to step down as an MP at the 2015 general election
^ "Labour MP Dai Havard to stand down at next election". BBC. 24 September 2014. Retrieved 28 March 2015.
full.title: Dai Havard
